awd_titl_txt: Group Travel for U.S. Participants to the 16th InternationalSymposium on the Chemistry of Natural Products, Kyoto,      Japan, May 29 -- June 2, 1988
awd_abstract_narration: A group of about 20 synthetic organic and natural products                      chemists will be selected to receive travel assistance to                       attend the 16th International Symposium on the Chemistry of                     Natural Products, which will be held in Kyoto, Japan, May                       29-June 3, 1988.  A strong presence at this meeting is                          extremely important in view of the ever-increasing strength of                  the Japanese chemical community.  Increased visibility of U.S.                  chemists will be beneficial to fruitful interactions between                    the two scientific communities.  The possibility of travel                      support through this grant will be advertised and the                           applications will be reviewed by a panel of senior scientists.                  Professional, ethnic, and geographic considerations will be                     considered in the final selection of grantees.  This travel                     grant is being funded by the Organic and Macromolecular                         Chemistry Program.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
